pr_title: Do not collect metrics of the requests to `TransientService` by default

timeline.message:
Do not log the request and response to/from `TransientService`
Motivation:
Related #3061
It will be nice if the request and response to/from `TransientService` are not logged by server side.

Modifications:
- Add defualt `shouldLogRequest` method to `Service`
  - `TransientService` returns `false` by default
- `PrometheusExpositionService` now implments `TransientService`
- Requests and responses to/from `TransientService` are not logged and recored by `LoggingService`, `AccessLogWriter` and `MetricCollectingService` anymore.
  - You should set `shouldLogRequest` to `true` to log them.

Result:
- Healtch check requests are not logged and recorded by `LoggingService`, `AccessLogWriter` and `MetricCollectingService` anymore .
- Close #3061
- (Deprecated) `new PrometheusExpositionService(CollectorRegistry)` is now deprecated.
  - Use `PrometheusExpositionService.of(CollectorRegistry)` instead.
